SELECT SA0411.DLR_CD --딜러코드 , SA0411.USR_ID --사용자ID , SA0411.REQ_SAL_NO AS REQ_SEQ --신청번호 , SA0411.ATC_DSTIN_CD --항목 , SA0411.CUST_NM --고객명 , SA0411.REQ_DT --등록일자 , SA0411.APPROVE_CD --상태 , SA0443.CARLINE_CD , FN_GET_CARLINE_NM(SA0443.CARLINE_CD) AS CARLINE_NM , SA0443.MODEL_CD , FN_GET_MODEL_NM(SA0443.MODEL_CD) AS MODEL_NM , SA0443.APP_QTY , SA0443.REQ_RC , B.CAR_CNT , B.SUM_QTY FROM SA_0411T SA0411 /* 집단판매업무권한신청정보 */ , (SELECT SA0443.DLR_CD,SA0443.USR_ID,SA0443.REQ_SEQ,SA0443.CARLINE_CD,SA0443.MODEL_CD,SA0443.APP_QTY,SA0443.REQ_RC FROM SA_0443T SA0443 , (SELECT DLR_CD,USR_ID,REQ_SEQ,MIN(CARLINE_CD) AS CARLINE_CD
FROM (SELECT * FROM SA_0443T WHERE CARLINE_CD = #{sCarlineCd}
AND MODEL_CD = #{sModelCd}
)
FROM SA_0443T
GROUP BY DLR_CD,USR_ID,REQ_SEQ ) A WHERE 1=1 AND SA0443.DLR_CD = A.DLR_CD AND SA0443.USR_ID = A.USR_ID AND SA0443.REQ_SEQ = A.REQ_SEQ AND SA0443.CARLINE_CD = A.CARLINE_CD ) SA0443 /* 집단판매업무권한신청정보 - 차량내역테이블 */ , (SELECT DLR_CD,USR_ID,REQ_SEQ,COUNT(CARLINE_CD) AS CAR_CNT,SUM(APP_QTY) AS SUM_QTY FROM SA_0443T GROUP BY DLR_CD,USR_ID,REQ_SEQ) B WHERE 1=1 AND SA0411.DLR_CD = SA0443.DLR_CD(+) AND SA0411.USR_ID = SA0443.USR_ID(+) AND SA0411.REQ_SEQ = SA0443.REQ_SEQ(+) AND SA0443.DLR_CD = B.DLR_CD AND SA0443.USR_ID = B.USR_ID AND SA0443.REQ_SEQ = B.REQ_SEQ AND SA0411.DEL_YN != 'Y'
and SA0411.DLR_CD = #{sDlrCd} -- 딜러코드
and SA0411.USR_ID = #{sUsrId} -- 사용자코드
AND SA0411.APPROVE_CD = #{sApproveCd} -- 상태
AND SA0411.REQ_DT >= #{sReqStartDt}
AND SA0411.REQ_DT < #{sReqEndDt} +1
ORDER BY
DLR_CD ASCDESC USR_ID ASCDESC REQ_SEQ ASCDESC ATC_DSTIN_CD ASCDESC CARLINE_NM ASCDESC MODEL_NM ASCDESC APP_QTY ASCDESC CUST_NM ASCDESC REQ_DT ASCDESC APPROVE_CD ASCDESC CAR_CNT ASCDESC SUM_QTY ASCDESC
REQ_SEQ DESC
